title: IDW's Transformers: Last Stand of the Wreckers (with extras)
description:
This torrent includes:

IDW's Last Stand of the Wreckers issues 1-5
"Bullets," an eleven-page prose story by James Roberts
"Out of 'Bullets,'" two pages of scenes cut from "Bullets"
"Dead Men's Boots," a one-page mosaic comic by Roberts, with art by Roche and Burcham
"Escape," a two-page comic by Roche, with art by Roche and Burcham
"Zero Point," a five-page prose story by Roberts
"In Word and Deed," a one-page comic by Roche, with art by Roche and Kris Carter
Character profiles for Rotorstorm, Pyro, Guzzle, Ironfist, Impactor, Snare, and Overlord
Six pages of script extracts, depicting alternate/original versions of scenes and deleted scenes, with commentary by Roberts
a one-page commentary about Squadron X by Roberts
Fisitron's Facts (trivia about the miniseries)
One page of extracts from Roche's (pre-Roberts) first draft

All files are in .cbr, .cbz, or .jpg format. Everything (except for the five issues themselves) is from the hardcover. The one color error from the original run has the correction from the TPB and HC.

Enjoy!
